title: Shades of Twilight
description: Like many fans of vampire romances, Melissa secretly wished hot, hunky vampires were real. When she finds one of her very own, she can’t believe her luck. Michael is everything she could have wanted and more, but unlike the handsome immortals in her favorite books, his skills are limited, especially in the face of unknown creatures that lurk in the shadows. If Michael can’t protect her, who will? Find out what happens when a star-eyed vampire novel fan meets the man of her dreams, only to discover she’s not cut out for a strange, new supernatural world.
